Personal Advice Colin Powell said he's not looking for a position in Barack Obama 's White House as the George W. Bush reshuffles the Cabinet. Among the positions likely to come open this year is that of Defense Secretary Robert Gates , who said last year that he expects to leave in 2011.

Iraq has been worth the cost and remains largely unapologetic about his handling of the conflict, The Washington Post reported on Wednesday. Had the government of Saddam Hussein remained in power the Middle East would be far more perilous than it is today, Donald Rumsfeld wrote in his 800-page memoir, scheduled for release on Tuesday.
